text: Letr = 1(1+ 0)*, s = 11*0 and ¢ = 1*0 be three regular expressions. Which one of the following is true? A.L(s) € L(r) and L(s) C L(t) B. L(r) € L(s) and L(s) C L(t) C.L(s) C L(t) and L(s) C L(r) D.L(t) € L(s) and L(s) C L(r) E. None of the above gate1991 theory-of-computation regular-expression normal multiple-selects
